price: 59 que notre première mort et que nous ne serons pas châtiés ?
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
